get.description: Root endpoint.

Download a generated PDF file from storage.

This endpoint serves files that were previously generated and stored.

post.description:
Calculate comprehensive real estate financial metrics.

Includes:
- NOI (Net Operating Income)
- Cap Rate
- Cash-on-Cash Return
- Gross Rent Multiplier
- Debt Yield
- LTV Ratio
- DSCR
- Rental Yield
- Operating Expense Ratio

schema.title: Response Calculate Financial Metrics Api V1 Agents Commercial Property Financial Metrics Post

post.description:
Value property using multiple approaches.

Approaches:
- Income Approach (Cap Rate)
- Sales Comparison Approach
- Cost Approach

schema.title: Response Value Property Api V1 Agents Commercial Property Financial Valuation Post

post.description:
Generate comprehensive market intelligence report.

Includes:
- Comparable transaction analysis
- Supply pipeline dynamics
- Yield benchmarks and trends
- Absorption and velocity metrics
- Market cycle position
- Actionable recommendations

schema.title: Response Generate Market Report Api V1 Agents Commercial Property Market Intelligence Report Post

post.description:
Sync market data from configured providers.

Admin only endpoint to refresh market data.

schema.title: Response Sync Market Data Api V1 Agents Commercial Property Market Intelligence Sync Post

get.description: Get recent market transactions.

schema.title: Response Get Market Transactions Api V1 Agents Commercial Property Market Intelligence Transactions Get

post.description:
Log a property using GPS coordinates.

This endpoint will:
- Reverse geocode the coordinates to get address
- Fetch URA zoning information
- Determine existing use
- Create or update property record
- Return comprehensive property information

get.description: Return advisory insights (mix, positioning, absorption, feedback).
Return previously captured advisory feedback entries.

schema.title: Response List Property Advisory Feedback Api V1 Agents Commercial Property Properties  Property Id  Advisory Feedback Get

post.description: Record market feedback from agents for developers to review.

Analysis types:
- raw_land: GFA potential, optimal use mix, scenarios
- existing_building: Renovation/redevelopment potential

post.description:
Upload and analyze a property photo.

This endpoint will:
- Extract EXIF data for location and timestamp
- Auto-tag site conditions
- Generate multiple image versions
- Store in S3/MinIO

Generate 3D massing scenarios for property development.

Scenario types:
- new_build: New construction based on zoning
- renovation: Existing building modifications
- mixed_use_conversion: Convert to mixed-use
- vertical_extension: Add floors to existing
- podium_tower: Podium with towers configuration
- phased_development: Multi-phase development

schema.title: Response List Ergonomics Api V1 Ergonomics  Get

post.description: Generate and stream a CAD/BIM export for the given project.
Evaluate the feasibility assessment for the selected rules.
Return the recommended rules for the submitted project.

get.description:
Stream a CSV export describing the requested finance scenario.

The export is optimised for spreadsheet workflows and mirrors the data that
is persisted after running the feasibility analysis. Consumers receive the
same escalated cost provenance, headline ratios, and the optional DSCR
timeline that appear in the UI. A ``400`` error is raised for non-positive
scenario identifiers while a ``404`` is returned when the scenario cannot be
found.

post.description:
Execute the full finance pipeline for the submitted scenario.

The endpoint escalates base construction costs, calculates NPV and IRR
figures, optionally derives a DSCR timeline, persists the scenario to the
database, and returns a structured summary that the frontend can render.
A ``404`` error is returned if the referenced finance project cannot be
located.

get.description: Return pending finance job metadata for a persisted scenario.

schema.title: Response List Finance Jobs Api V1 Finance Jobs Get

get.description: Test endpoint to verify API is working.

post.description:
Calculate buildable metrics using jurisdiction-agnostic system.

This endpoint uses the production buildable.py service which queries
RefRule database for jurisdiction-specific regulations.

Args:
    land_area_sqm: Land area in square meters
    zoning: Zoning code (e.g., 'residential', 'commercial')
    jurisdiction: Jurisdiction code (e.g., 'SG', 'US-NY')
    street_width_m: Optional street width for envelope calculations

Returns:
    Buildable metrics including plot ratio, max height, GFA, NSA, etc.

get.description:
Calculate GFA utilization and remaining development potential.

Key metric for space optimization - shows how much more can be built.

post.description:
Check building code compliance for proposed design against Singapore URA/BCA rules.

Compares proposed design parameters against maximum allowed values from RefRule database.
Returns pass/fail status with detailed violations list.

Create a new Singapore property with automatic compliance checking.

This endpoint:
1. Creates the property record
2. Runs BCA and URA compliance checks
3. Calculates GFA utilization and space optimization potential
4. Returns property with compliance status

get.description:
List all Singapore properties with optional filters.

Public endpoint - no authentication required for viewing.

schema.title: Response List Properties Api V1 Singapore Property List Get

delete.description: Soft delete a property (marks as inactive).

get.description: Get a specific property by ID.

put.description:
Update a property and re-run compliance checks.

Compliance checks run automatically whenever property details change.

post.description:
Run detailed BCA and URA compliance checks for a property.

Returns comprehensive compliance report with violations, warnings,
and recommendations for space optimization.

tags.description: Roadmaps, studies, stakeholder engagements, and legal instruments captured for entitlement delivery.

tags.name: market-intelligence

tags.name: compliance
